title.narrative: Alliance-building and supporting movements for change, including by supporting civil society and the women’s movement, engaging men and boys and partnering with the private sector while focusing on generating adequate resources.

description.narrative: this output focuses on establishing and leveraging institutional relationship with the nodal agency, Ministry for Women and Child Development, Civil Society Organizations (CSO) and Private and Public Sector to actualize the Global and National Gender agenda. These partnerships promote knowledge generation, resource mobilization and institutional capacity building on Gender issues and India’s normative commitments. In 2020, the Office will leverage the network of the Business Sector Advisory Council, with key deliverables towards generating financial and non-financial support. It will also leverage the CSR Trust for SDGs in India, established by the RCO to channelize CSR funding from the corporate sector, especially with respect to deepening programming in the Aspirational Districts. The Office will also partner with influencers from media, academia, business, sports and politics for greater outreach in mass events and campaigns.
